text: The lek is the money used in Albania. For values higher than 1 it is called lekÃ«. 100 qindarka make 1 lek but qindarka are not used any more. The lek was formed in 1926 by King Zog and it is named after Alexander the Great. ==Other websites== * Banknotes of Albania Category:Currency of Europe Category:Albania
title: Albanian lek
